MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G44 postcode area of Glasgow. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11am to carry out repairs to faulty electrical equipment at Strathdee Substation and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.31am on Monday 5th April 2021.
